statements: SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE follow_up_date IS NULL;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '456e89b1-12d3-456a-123e-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time < '08:00:00';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, follow_up_date FROM appointments WHERE follow_up_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_appointments;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, provider_id FROM patient_appointments WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patient_appointments WHERE provider_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_visits ORDER BY follow_up_date DESC, follow_up_time ASC;
SELECT patient_id, provider_id, follow_up_date, follow_up_time FROM follow_up_visits WHERE patient_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM patient_appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2023-01-01' AND provider_id = 100 ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patient_appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30' AND provider_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_visits WHERE follow_up_date <= '2023-12-31' ORDER BY follow_up_date, follow_up_time;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id FROM patient_appointments WHERE patient_id = 500 AND appointment_date > '2023-08-15' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time;
SELECT follow_up_id, patient_id, provider_id, follow_up_date, follow_up_time FROM follow_up_visits WHERE follow_up_date >= '2023-07-01' AND provider_id = 300;
SELECT * FROM Appointment;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointment ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Provider WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_duration FROM Appointment WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM Appointment WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-31';
SELECT provider_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointment INNER JOIN Provider ON Appointment.provider_id = Provider.provider_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT provider_id, specialty FROM Provider ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_duration FROM Appointment WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, email FROM patients ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE specialty='Dentist';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM patients WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM patients WHERE patient_id=1;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE provider_id=3;
SELECT * FROM patient;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_provider ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_type FROM appointment WHERE appointment_date > NOW();
SELECT follow_up_notes FROM follow_up WHERE follow_up_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patient WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT p.patient_name, h.specialty FROM patient p JOIN healthcare_provider h ON p.patient_id = h.provider_id;

SELECT a.appointment_date, f.follow_up_date, m.medication_name FROM appointment a JOIN follow_up f ON a.appointment_id = f.appointment_id JOIN medication m ON f.follow_up_id = m.follow_up_id WHERE m.dosage LIKE '%mg';
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE appointment_type IN ('Follow-up', 'Check-up') ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
